data.text: @MaryUtah @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord There is no walking a statement like that back. It’s vile and shows his true character.
@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord He did walk it back, but educating oneself is best before posting on social media, is vital for leaders

@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord You have no clue what it's like to have an invading army come down on you and your family. You have no idea what war is like. The suffering and carnage. Innocent people dead in the street in front of your house. You are an entitled as*hole.

@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord @DaveAlvord, there are women and children being slaughtered right now. People driven from their homes. Random mortar attacks in suburban areas. How about you step outside of your house and imagine what it would be like. You're from SoJo...
@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord This guy @DaveAlvord is part of the Putin wing of the GOP. We need to stand up to all Putin supporters. They are anti-democratic and anti-American.

@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord Another Utah dime-a-dozen, corrupt, entitled, right-wing grievance monkey who loves complaining about everything while lining his own pockets the entire time. Sound familiar? @SpencerJCox @BradWilsonGOP @SeanReyesUT @MikeLeeforUtah
@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord Are u fkn kidding me rn? Why does anything that comes from the mouth of an elected official in Utah surprise me? Do better Utah. This is gross.
@Justagirlfedup @SLCo_Council @DaveAlvord He is the most arrogant, self-serving ass.  His responses in official capacity are insufferable and so condescending.
